actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the estate tax deduction for charitable contributions.

summary.text: Disallows an estate tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for charitable contributions with respect to specified property which has passed from the decedent prior to his death.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the estate tax deduction for charitable contributions.
